title: The login queue is like Black Friday at a Wal-Mart
body:
You open up those flood gates only to get clogged by fat people.

GG

replies.body: Sadly we can't run over eachother or fight for que spots like in the real black friday sales... I love watching those feeds on youtube and such.
You could always find people....and make them disappear.
Hehe... This is a reason to make a deal for Kalista right? XD

Or Satan.

But then he would just sit there and wait until his victim moved out of their chair.  {{champion:17}}
I forgot, I need to make a deal with Kalista to destroy Teemo.
Logged in to say that the same thing is happening to me, im on my third try and third round of waiting in extensive que. Ill let you know if it works.
Same here, on my third try stuck at "logging on." Stop teasing Riot

I'M IN !!!!!!!!!!!! BUT IT'S SUPER BUGGED !!!!!!!!!!!! Like I can't connect to chat service and the store... It's just a black screen with the loading icon for a while and the Kalista bundle has the "place holder image ( gray block ) Splash currently in progress"

> I'M IN !!!!!!!!!!!! BUT IT'S SUPER BUGGED !!!!!!!!!!!! Like I can't connect to chat service and the store... It's just a black screen with the loading icon for a while and the Kalista bundle has the "place holder image ( gray block ) Splash currently in progress"

I had the problem when I first logged in too. they resolved it after a couple hours.
I cant even get to the store, says logging onto chat service....
Yeah it's gonna be like that until you log out then back in, but I'm still debating on that because I don't want to wait a million years to get back in... So much solitaire idk if I can keep going...
Real talk, my friend.
I'm glad I never logged out. I don't have any problems because I was signed on.
haha spot on
been stuck on login also. Must we wait another 12 hrs Riot?
Lol. just exit and try again, it always works for me.
XD My sides~
But no one has died yet. SO its not just like it, but similar
still waiting to play....
Watched my queue timer tick down from 60 minutes twice now and still haven't gotten in. This is bullshit. {{item:3070}}

:(, i've passed my que timer now i'm just stuck "logging in" for the last 2 minutes

QQ: followed by a connection error, and needing to re go through that horrendious line


security didn't want me buying nothing and sent me to the back of the line for looking at him wrong
Riot is just sitting in a room, quietly laughing while we struggle to push ourselves through to purchase that sexy Kalista.
i literally just used this for my friend. RITO PLS
1hour and 3minutes for me.
